decks.notes: This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggression by quickly deploying creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, supported by burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah for added value. The mana base is optimized for speed and consistency with fetch lands and utility lands like Arena of Glory. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Static Prison and Blood Moon to hinder opponents' strategies. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly with a combination of creature threats and removal spells.

The deck focuses on utilizing Indomitable Creativity to combo with Archon of Cruelty and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to generate powerful plays. It also includes cards like Reprieve and Leyline Binding for protection and control, along with Lightning Bolt and Prismatic Ending for removal. The mana base is designed to support the combo pieces and provide flexibility with fetch lands. The inclusion of Wrenn and Six adds value by recurring lands and providing additional options. Overall, the deck aims to be creative in its combos while maintaining a strong control element.

The deck focuses on aggressive play with creatures like Ocelot Pride and Amped Raptor, supported by cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury. Utilizing Static Prison to control the opponent's board and Galvanic Discharge for removal, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly. Ranger-Captain of Eos helps tutor key creatures while Phantasmal Image offers flexibility. The deck also includes cards for utility and mana fixing. Overall, Jeskai Aggro aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain control throughout the game.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize Eldrazi creatures and control elements to overwhelm the opponent. Cards like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Ulamog, the Defiler provide powerful threats, while control elements like All Is Dust and Kozilek's Command help disrupt the opponent's game plan. Through the Breach allows for explosive plays, while cards like Sowing Mycospawn and Ugin's Labyrinth help to control the board state. The deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent through a combination of powerful creatures and disruptive spells.
